attributes.action: Take steps to make CANZUK a possibility
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to take steps toward this agreement because it’s an excellent idea for our global recognition. Canada,Australia and New Zealand are some of the UK’s oldest and greatest allies. The CANZUK nations have been through so many things side by side, including WW1 & WWII. We cannot ignore the very nations that brought our country to where it is today. This agreement will improve our Economy, GDP per capita and much more. So sign this petition to make it a reality!
attributes.background: The Government promised that after we left the EU we would secure more trade/defence agreements with our allies. Will the Government consider CANZUK?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to 'take steps'. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
